subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: In an improbable series of plays in the final 75 seconds of the Super Bowl, the Seahawks landed on the threshold of their second straight N.F.L. title, but the Patriots snatched it away.
snippet: In an improbable series of plays in the final 75 seconds of the Super Bowl, the Seahawks landed on the threshold of their second straight N.F.L. title, but the Patriots snatched it away.
